description: A modular Telegram userbot running on Python 3.9 with an sqlalchemy database,

api_hash.description: Custom message for .alive command. We have our own alive message by default.

del_cmds.description: It changes your bot pattern (default pattern is '.' (dot)).

load.description: ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules.

message_dump.description: Add the Heroku app name here. Required for updates.

no_load.description: Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account. Required for updates.

owner_id.description: Chat ID of the Log group. If value is 0, log feature not work. If value is left blank, logs send in Saved Messages

spamwatch_api.description: If you need verbosity on the console logging.

strict_antispam.description: PM Auto Ban Feature. Also known as 'bleep blop, this is a bot...'.

sudo_users.description: Custom PM Message Count for PM Auto Ban feature. Also known as Pmpermit Module.

whitelist_users.description: Custom PM Message Count for PM Auto Ban feature. Also known as Pmpermit Module.

workers.description: Custom message for PM Auto Ban feature. Also known as Pmpermit Module.

name: Telegram
